name: Torah (Genesis–Deuteronomy)
short: Law given through Moses; foundational covenant text.

name: Wisdom Literature
short: Poetic and philosophical writings: Job, Psalms, Proverbs, etc.

name: Prophets (Isaiah–Malachi)
short: Major and minor prophets; pre- and post-exilic warnings and hopes.

name: Gospels (Matthew–John)
short: Life, teachings, death, and resurrection of Yahshua (Christ).

name: Acts of the Apostles
short: Early church history and spread of the gospel through Israelite disciples.

name: Pauline & General Epistles
short: Letters to dispersed assemblies of Israel and believing nations.

name: Revelation
short: Prophecy of the end age and restoration of Israelite kingdom.
